title: How to Change the Colour of the Gridlines of a Table on Word

steps.title: Select "Borders and Shading" from the dropdown/context menu.
steps.content: Select "Borders and Shading" from the dropdown/context menu.

steps.title: Click on the "Borders" tab.
steps.content: Click on the "Borders" tab. On the left hand side, under "setting", there are a no. of options including Box, All, Grid and Custom.

steps.title: Choose your style, colour and width.
steps.content: Choose your style, colour and width.
